description:
Wow, I don't think I've ever had so much fun in all my life!
Many thanks to my friend who allowed us to use his beautiful lakeside condo. And having three hot, young, funny guys along didn't hurt either.
It was a perfect trip. Parker, Billy, and Danny had a really good time and after a few days they were best (fuck) buds.
"OK, for our last day I want to do something really special," I told them.
A few ideas were bandied about, but it was Billy — shy, sexy Billy — who came up with the winning idea.
"I want to be in the middle of a fuck sandwich," he said in his soft-spoken voice.
That really cracked up Parker and Danny. They thought it was funny.
"Then a fuck sandwich it is," I said.
Now, of course, you don't just jump right into a fuck sandwich. You have to build one.
So we started out with Billy feasting on Parker's cock and Danny's ass — at the same time!
Then Billy fucked Danny and then Parker fucked Billy.
And then the stars aligned. Parker's cock went up Billy's ass while Billy's cock went up Danny's ass. I was a feat of acrobatics but the guys did it.
Now that's a fuck session!
title: Parker, Billy & Danny
